title: Bug 114905: Default value set in list box of report parameter is lost after modifying the default value
description: Description: The default value set in the list box of the report parameter is lost after modifying the default value.
OB: The default value set in the list box of the report parameter is lost after modifying the default value.
EB: Change the Display type to Combo Box. The expected result is that 'aaa' is the default value. After performing step 5, the OK button should be grayed out.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Set a default value in the list box of the report parameter.
2. Modify the default value.
3. Observe that the default value is lost.
4. Change the Display type to Combo Box.
5. Verify that 'aaa' is set as the default value.
6. Attempt to click the OK button and confirm that it is grayed out.
